project.name: removed
project.description:
This build file checks for the removed properties, ant targets etc. Checks made inside of this build script should fail hard (i.e. error-out as soon as possible) so the user is forced to update his/her property files etc.
Once the item has been deprecated in one release, in the next release it should be moved here from the deprecated list.
